entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow mixed with ice pellets changing to light snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
